attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a Bank Holiday in England and move the 2 Bank Holidays in May to August or September.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. St Georges Day deserves celebration in England.

2. The 2 public holidays in May are a waste of time as the weather is usually poor and the holidays come so quickly after Easter. The days would be better for the well-being and enjoyment of the country if they were moved to August or September (and re-named if necessary).
